name: Oogle
description:
A very short 2D puzzle-platformer made in a week for the Brackeys 2020.2 game jam. The third game I've ever made and the one I'm proudest of (as of publishing, at least).

The game features a rewinding time mechanic to match the jam theme "Rewind", both in the level rewind which occurs once the player reaches the goal, and later by holding the F key, but only for a short time (think POP: Sands of Time).

CONTROLS:

A/D or Left and Right Arrow keys to move. W, SPACE or Up arrow to jump.

Rewind time by holding the F key (once unlocked by grabbing the multicoloured rewind powerup - sorry, no indication of gaining this power  in-game).

From the Game Over screen, you can press the R key to restart.

Main Menu is mouse controlled.
